attributes.action: give the britsh public some peace of mind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the british voting and taxpaying public we ask that you disclose some information on the circumstances of the recall to prison of Jon Venables. We also ask that as he now has a 3rd identity you give us some peace of mind and tell us where you our goverment have been hiding him for the last 9 years. We do not ask for full disclosure but just some information which may give us some form of peace of mind.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
